steps.text: Remove transmission from vehicle - see operation "Transmission, Remove and Install"
Disassemble transmission - see operation "Transmission, Seal Completely"
Inspect relevant gear shift fork. If plastic parts in hatched area are worn, or damaged, or if gear shift fork is damaged in any way, then gear shift fork must be replaced
Assemble transmission - see operation "Transmission, Seal Completely"
Install transmission in vehicle- see operation "Transmission, Remove and Install"
